name: Assault On Proxima
description:
In the year 2915 humans have colonised the stars local to Sol. The Terran colonies on Proxima C5 have been invaded by hostile aliens known as the Gacrux. As part of Strike Force Delta, an elite squad of interstellar marines, you must liberate the colony bases and defeat the invaders!

Assault On Proxima is a Sci-Fi First Person Shooter where you must battle against the nefarious Gacrux aliens from another star!



Blast and explode the nasty aliens in the Assault On Proxima Singeplayer Campaign.
Adventure across the rocky wastes of the moon of the Gas Giant Proxima C, while hunting down the the alien threat. Investigate futuristic research facilities and military bases. Reach the alien hive and defeat the alien bosses.



Team up to defeat the hordes of invading ETs in the Co-Op Campaign with up to 4 friends online. Join your friends to fight against Gacrux bots in the multiplayer game modes.



Test your shooting skill and wits against other Players in Online Player Versus Player matches with 3 game modes, including: Capture the Flag, Conquest, and Free For All. In multiplayer PvP, play as the human marines of Strike Force Delta, or as the Gacrux aliens intent on defeating humanity.



Play as one of 4 Classes: Assault, Soldier, Recon or Medic and defeat your opponents in your chosen playstyle. Customise your role with 5 powerful weapons, a character perk, and a range of explosives.

Lead the Assault On Proxima and save the human exo-colonies from the alien invasion!
